question: A number is increased by 20% and then decreased by 20%. What is the net change?
If the ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:2 and there are 15 boys, how many girls are there?
What is the next number in the series: 1, 4, 9, 16, ?
A shopkeeper marks an item at Rs.500 and gives a discount of 10%. What is the selling price?
If the speed of a car is increased from 40 km/hr to 60 km/hr, what is the percentage increase?
The average of 5 numbers is 20. If one number is excluded, the average becomes 18. What is the excluded number?
If A can complete a work in 10 days and B can complete it in 20 days, how many days will they take together?
What is the simple interest on Rs.2000 at 5% per annum for 3 years?
If the cost price of an item is Rs.400 and it is sold at a profit of 25%, what is the selling price?
A train 120 meters long passes a pole in 6 seconds. What is its speed?
